version_description:
• Updated to better support iOS 8
• UI updates
• Updated push notifications to alert you when a video is done downloading from Dropbox

• Updated to better support iOS 8
• UI updates
• Updated push notifications to alert you when a video is done downloading from Dropbox

• Updated to better support iOS 9 and larger devices.
• Added ability to Log out of a connected Dropbox account.

• Updated to better support iOS 9 and larger devices.
• Added ability to Log out of a connected Dropbox account.

- Fixed issue with Dropbox integration.*
- Updated code base to be faster and more efficient
- Misc. bug fixes

*If you experience any issues browsing your Dropbox folders, please unlink your Dropbox account in the Settings window.

- Fixed issue with Dropbox integration.*
- Updated code base to be faster and more efficient
- Misc. bug fixes

*If you experience any issues browsing your Dropbox folders, please unlink your Dropbox account in the Settings window.

- App should no longer redisplay the video controls when a video loops.
- Fixed issue with video thumbnail disappearing.

- App should no longer redisplay the video controls when a video loops.
- Fixed issue with video thumbnail disappearing.
Resolves a bug with the Dropbox feature
Resolves a bug with the Dropbox feature

Bug fixes
Link to Loopideo Pro, out now!

Bug fixes
Link to Loopideo Pro, out now!

New Features:
***PLEASE NOTE: Tap a video to select, click "Play Videos" to start Looping.***
1.) New interface for uploading videos
-select the “Add Videos” button to display the video import menu
-select the source you would like to upload from
-tap the video you would like to upload
2.) Upload videos from your OneDrive Account
-Personal accounts only; Business and School accounts are not compatible
-Loopideo limits users to 3 free downloads from OneDrive
-Purchase Loopideo Pro for unlimited downloads from OneDrive
3.) Videos in the Gallery which have already been imported are indicated with a green border
-Tap the videos you would like to import.
-Select “Done” to import the videos and return to the main screen.
-Select “Cancel” to return to the main screen with no imports.
4.) Videos from Dropbox and OneDrive which have already been imported are indicated with a blue checkmark
5.) Have suggestions to make Loopideo even better? Tap the idea icon to share your thoughts with our development team!
6.) Have questions on how to use Loopideo? See the How To Use Loopideo instructions located in the application settings

Added support for Slow Motion videos
Added support for Shared Libraries - share your media with your team or between devices for easy looping

Added support for Slow Motion videos
Added support for Shared Libraries - share your media with your team or between devices for easy looping

Bug Fixes
-Complete support for iCloud synced libraries
-Fixed issue with deletion of OneDrive videos

Bug Fixes
-Complete support for iCloud synced libraries
-Fixed issue with deletion of OneDrive videos

Bug Fixes

Fixed a bug that caused some older Photo Gallery videos to fail to play.
Fixed a bug that caused some slo-motion videos to fail to play.

Bug Fixes

Fixed a bug that caused some older Photo Gallery videos to fail to play.
Fixed a bug that caused some slo-motion videos to fail to play.
Bug fix for infinite feedback loop that occurred on devices running older versions of iOS
Bug fix for infinite feedback loop that occurred on devices running older versions of iOS

Fixed a bug causing some users to experience a crash when playing videos.

Improved display of thumbnail so that older videos no longer display an incorrect thumbnail.

User will now be notified if they attempt to play a video that was deleted from their photo gallery.

Fixed a bug causing some users to experience a crash when playing videos.

Improved display of thumbnail so that older videos no longer display an incorrect thumbnail.

User will now be notified if they attempt to play a video that was deleted from their photo gallery.

1. Fixed bugs causing some users to experience a crash while downloading videos from OneDrive.

2. Based on users feedback we have handled margin of 'How To Use Loopideo' page.

3. Improved user experience for Drop Box video processing.

4. Fixed bugs related to Drop Box.

5. Fixed bugs related to Drop Box login via Google login.

6. Fixed bugs related to display of Thumbnail.

1. Fixed crashes inside the app.

2. Fixed bug, 3gp file were not downloaded from one drive.

3. Fixed bug, switch the button off when the user presses cancel when logging in to one drive.
